name: Toybox (itch) (Tyson Butler-Boschma)
description:
Toybox is a fast-paced Multiplayer FPS focusing on action, humor and fun. The player has an array of crazy weapons and tools to mutilate their friends. 

This is a university project built as a mod to Unreal Tournament in UDK.  

This also the game that started it all and is the inspiration for my teams current company, Toybox Games Studios! https://www.toyboxgamesstudios.com/

Expect bugs but overall can be fun to see an early student work. 

Credits:
